dmca.title: Auto-trolling for infringers
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam:

My name is [Private] and I am the Corporate Secretary, as well as the Manager of the legal department, of Auto-trol Technology Corporation ("Auto-trol"). It has come to our attention that you have registered and are using "www.autotroll.com" (the "domain name") as a World Wide Web domain name in connection with a web site. Auto-trol Technology has used the name Auto-trol in commerce since 1977. Further, please be advised that Auto-trol owns all rights, title and interests in the trademark Auto-trol Technology
